getSentBytesCount().Description: Returns the number of bytes transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.

getResponseCount().Description: Returns the number of responses transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.

getReceivedBytesCount().Description: Returns the number of bytes transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.

getRequestCount().Description: Returns the number of requests transferred over the connection, 0 if not available.

Returns: the object representing the metric requested, null if the metric cannot not found.
Parameters: the name of the metric to query.
getMetric(java.lang.String).Description: Return the value for the specified metric.

ClassDesc: Please use @B_java#net#URL#openConnection_E@ instead. Please visit The point of access to the statistics of an @B_org#apache#http#HttpConnection_E@.
